```{r setup}
library(dfsOptimizer)
library(ROI.plugin.glpk)
data("nhl_players")
```

# Basic Usage
Example of Instantiating Optimizer, adding players from internal dataset `nhl_players`,
generating 5 lineups, and viewing those lineups with summary statistics.

```{r}
mod <- create_optimizer(site = 'DRAFTKINGS', sport = 'HOCKEY', contest_type = 'CLASSIC')
mod <- add_players_from_df(mod, nhl_players)

# Generate lineups
lineups <- build_lineups(mod, num_lineups = 5, verbose = FALSE)

# View lineups
lineups

# Summary stats
summary(lineups)

```
